sentences.sContent: The amount of love you get from an investment in love is correlated, if only roughly, to the amount of yourself you invest in the relationship.
sentences.sContent_eng: The amount of love you get from an investment in love is correlated, if only roughly, to the amount of yourself you invest in the relationship.
sentences.sCn: 你获得的爱与对爱的投入是相互关联的，如果粗略来算，就是与你自己在这段关系中的投入总量相称。

sentences.sContent: In one experiment Mr Coates sampled testosterone levels in traders in London and found that higher levels of the hormone in the morning correlated with beefier profits in the afternoon.
sentences.sContent_eng: In one experiment Mr Coates sampled testosterone levels in traders in London and found that higher levels of the hormone in the morning correlated with beefier profits in the afternoon.
sentences.sCn: 在一次实验中，科茨先生对伦敦交易员做了睾酮量的抽样调查，他发现早晨中偏高的激素量与午后的高利润有着相互关联。

sentences.sContent: Almost everywhere we look in the world, we see that giving money or gifts to others is positively correlated with happiness.
sentences.sContent_eng: Almost everywhere we look in the world, we see that giving money or gifts to others is positively correlated with happiness.
sentences.sCn: 我们在世界上探究几乎每个地方，发现给予别人金钱或礼物和幸福感是正面相关连的。

words.tran: 使有相互关系；互相有关系
